Vikingcraft is a lore-server set inside the Early-Medieval Timeperiod, in the era of Ragnar Lothbrok. It is a world filled with mystery, danger and adventure. Great Warriors and Leaders influence the world and politics, armies form, navies rise, empires and kingdoms rise from the fields. It is a world of infinite capability. constantly updated with new features every-week.
The Owners of Vikingcraft are IgnWu and ThePenmaester
We use HeoSystems which is the greatest minecraft-hosting there is, with constant support from the HeoSystem's owner Hamza who has contributed a lot to Vikingcraft development!
Vikingcraft has a extensive set of rules to ensure everyone has fun and nothing is abused
Common Sense| Common Sense means you understand the basic-idea of the server, and just because something isn't clearly stated in the rules, you still have the common-sense to know its not allowed
Hacking| Hacking of any sort, including Xray is bannable
Discrimination| Don't harrass or attack anyone just because of the color of their skin, their disabilities or their sexuality. Be a kind person
Toxicity| Do not be overrally-toxic, being mad in the moment is fine, but don't harrass or take the game too-seriously
Do not steal/ kill or attack anybody outside of Active Hours
a Backstory of your characters upbringing and what has led him to be where he is, Don't give yourself stolen valor, Keep it simple [100 Words Minimum]
A Character can only master one class, there are 3 classes to choose from, Axeman, Archer, Swordsman
Admins cannot have characters.
Age of Character
Backstory of Character
Character Information
Character names must be realistic and cannot directly copy a movie-character name. Be original
Characters are recognisable by voices and skins, You cannot change your skin but you can mask yourself with armor as nametags are turned off.
Characters are who you play on the server, characters create stories

Characters must fit their description, if you say your character is peaceful, and kind, you cannot simply go around on the server murdering people, You can evolve your character through roleplay and interactions. But you must fit your emotions. This also means you need to have a skin related to your character description
Characters under 18 cannot marry, [OOC: If you are 18 you cannot marry under 18 year olds, if you are below 18 you cannot marry over 18 year-olds to keep it not-weird]
Describe the way your character looks and its personality
Description of character
Family of Character
Format
How to create a character:
If you are a champion you must renew your allegiance to your god weekly, if you do, during that week you cannot disobey the God you follow under a binding contract

If your character dies you cannot join back the same-team for 1 week which is 1-year in lore on a new character, You loose all your skills, all your rankings, and your next-character cannot be apart of the same family as the last, you also loose all your items, and are unwhitelisted until you create a new-character
List any family that the character has, once set may not be able to be unset
Name of Character
Put in the name of your character must be Nordic themed ending in son or daughter [Bjorn Ragnar son as a example]
The age of your character must be atleast 13, your character cannot marry until it is 18,
The only information your characters may use is the information they are told face to face in roleplay during Active-hours, They can also use any information which a Owner verifies
When Characters die in minecraft, in lore it is known as a Knockout, The ways of characters acctually dying in lore, and not being able to be played anymore are listed below
Characters may only die in Active-Hours

Breaking FearRP, when your character is outnumbered 4 to 1 you can be placed under fear-rp, If you disobey the people who have put you under FearRP' demands then they can kill you and it will count as a character-death, The demands must be reasonable and cannot be something like jump into this volcano. for every 1 person you need 4 to outnumber them. to capture 3 people you need 12
